statements: UPDATE HealthMetrics SET temperature = 37.5 WHERE metric_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE HealthMetrics SET steps = 8000, heart_rate = 75, record_timestamp = NOW() WHERE person_id = '98765432-abcdef-1234-zxcv-0987654321zy';
UPDATE HealthMetrics SET temperature = 98.6, steps = steps + 100 WHERE person_id = '12345678-abcd-1234-efgh-87654321abcd' AND record_timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:00:00';
UPDATE HealthMetrics SET heart_rate = 72, temperature = 99.2, steps = steps - 50 WHERE person_id = '87654321-abcd-4321-efgh-12345678abcd' AND record_timestamp = '2022-01-20 12:30:00';
UPDATE health_metrics SET heart_rate = 80, calories_burned = 300 WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE user_info SET age = 30, weight = 65.5, gender = 'male' WHERE user_id = 201
UPDATE health_metrics SET heart_rate = 80, steps = 10000 WHERE user_id = 1234;
UPDATE user_info SET age = 30, height = 175.5, weight = 70.2 WHERE user_id = 5678;
UPDATE health_metrics SET heart_rate=80, steps=500 WHERE user_id=100;
UPDATE user_profile SET user_name='John Doe', age=30 WHERE user_id=200;
UPDATE health_metrics SET heart_rate = 80, steps = 1000 WHERE user_id = 123 AND timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00';
UPDATE user_profile SET user_name = 'Alice', age = 30 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE health_metrics SET heart_rate = 75, step_count = 500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_profile SET weight = 70.5, age = 30 WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE health_metrics SET heart_rate = 80, step_count = 500 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE device_information SET firmware_version = 'v2.0', device_name = 'Smartwatch' WHERE user_id = 5
UPDATE wearable_devices SET manufacturing_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE device_id = 'c9b4cea5-e4ef-49f9-bb51-18b3f4c83bae';
UPDATE health_metrics SET metric_value = 78.5, timestamp = '2022-05-15 08:30:00' WHERE metric_id = '507b4099-1506-4a1a-982e-9aef917c4500';
UPDATE wearable_devices SET device_type = 'Smartwatch', manufacturing_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE device_id = '36dab7c2-54f0-4e0f-93a0-f42c6f19f507'
UPDATE users SET date_of_birth = '1990-05-20', gender = 'Female' WHERE user_id = 'bd0e88f8-f0f3-4981-a0c7-3c2d198f2466'
